justification: The metacontrol of decision-making strategies was assessed using a sequential decision-making task that dissociates model-free and model-based decision-making strategies, manipulating reward stakes and task complexity.

NFC was measured using the German NFC short-scale in Study 1, which consists of 16 items recorded on a 7-point Likert scale. This scale reflects the intrinsic motivation for cognitively demanding activities.
In Study 2, NFC was assessed with the English NFC short-scale, comprising 18 items on a 5-point Likert scale, designed to measure the same intrinsic motivation for cognitively demanding activities.
